EventStory.Headline: Edited Transcript of PTMN.OQ M&A conference call or presentation 24-Dec-20 1:30pm GMT
EventStory.Body:
Harvest Capital Credit Corp to Merge into Portman Ridge Finance Corp - M&A Call
NEW YORK Dec 24, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Portman Ridge Finance Corp M&A conference call or presentation Thursday, December 24, 2020 at 1:30:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript
